parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Groups

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets group speed mode. If unit is passed as param, unit's group is used. Mode may be one of: 
* '''"UNCHANGED"''' (unchanged)
* '''"LIMITED"''' (half speed)
* '''"NORMAL"''' (full speed, maintain formation)
* '''"FULL"''' (do not wait for any other units in formation)

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> groupName '''setSpeedMode''' mode

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> groupName: [[Object]] or [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> mode: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_groupOne [[setSpeedMode]] "LIMITED";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[speedMode]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
